description: This file defines a Flutter widget that displays a pie chart representing a category breakdown of expenses, utilizing external charting library 'fl_chart' and application model 'analytics'.

classes.name: CategoryPieChart
classes.description: A stateless Flutter widget that visualizes a list of category breakdowns as a pie chart.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the pie chart, calculates total spent, and constructs pie chart sections based on breakdown data.

methods.name: _chartColor
methods.description: Returns a predefined color based on index, with adjusted opacity, for pie chart section coloring.
